title: Public tenders, complaints, machine learning and recommender systems: a case study in public administration
analysis_techniques: Document analysis; Machine learning; Recommender system; Simulation/experiment
technology_discussed: Artificial intelligence; Machine learning; Recommender systems
research_description: This case study focuses on using machine learning to predict legal disputes in public procurement processes in Italy and develops a recommender system to find similar procurements.
research_results: The study developed machine learning classifiers capable of predicting procurement-related complaints, and a recommender system for matching similar procurement cases.
future_research: Future research could explore applying the developed systems in other legal and procurement domains across Europe to assess their generalizability and effectiveness.
